News.headline: Bar Spectacular: Daggers v Braintree Town 2nd January 2017
News.page_title: Bar Spectacular: Daggers v Braintree Town 2nd January 2017
News.URL_keywords: Bar Spectacular: Daggers v Braintree Town 2nd January 2017
News.short_description: Finish off your Christmas and New Year Celebrations with the Daggers.
News.description:
In addition to the “Friends for a Fiver” promotion allowing all season ticket holders to bring a guest to our televised Vanarma National League fixture v Braintree Town  anywhere in the stadium for just £5 the Club will also be repeating it’s festive Bar Promotion.
Following on from the great feedback we received after the match v Solihull Moors all draft beers and premium bottle beers will again be just £2.50 a pint / bottle. A glass of wine just £2.00 and a half pint of draft lemonade or coca cola just 50p.

As well as toasting in the New Year with these great prices we will also be showing throughout the Club live HD Premier League action all day.
Middlesbrough v Leicester City                              KO 12.30pm
Blackburn Rovers v Newcastle United                    KO  3.00pm
West Ham United v Manchester United                   KO 5.15pm

All this culminating with live action with Dagenham & Redbridge v Braintree Town kicking off at 7.45pm.

All in all a great value day for all footie fans. Order your tickets online here
